description: New from the Griffith Institute: A working copy of Topographical Bibliography8.4 (Stelae: Dynasty XVIII to the Roman Period). Hieroglyphic signs have been removed and the copy is watermarked. Please email us (griffith.institute@orinst.ox.ac.uk) if your book or article have by mistake been left out (apologies in advance). In order to be taken into account, your corrections and additions must reach us by August 26. (August 7, 2011) Further additions have been made to Portraits and manuscript images of handwriting of Egyptologists. (August 7, 2011) And see Open Access Archives: Griffith Institute

title: New from the Griffith Institute
